episode_event_rulina_saida_solo/6901_100:
I should’ve known I’d run into you here, Raihan.
Makes sense considering Leon is here, too.
What do you think of Pasio so far?

I’m impressed. It’s just what I’d expect from a
place where the strongest Trainers from around
the world gather.

Since arriving here, I’ve discovered more things
to study and areas in which I can improve.

We train under the pressure of dropping to the
minor division or having our position in the
Gym Challenge rearranged...
I think that’s helped us become mentally strong.

I’ll say! I was really thrown off guard by how
quickly you two went on the attack!

I suppose that means we’ve received passing
marks from Misty and the others.

Why don’t we celebrate by going out for
something to eat?
Good idea! I know just where to take you!

I am rather fond of foods that are swee—
Er, good for one’s body!

*chuckle* Why don’t we go replenish our sugar
reserves, then?
